content.text: [@Jon The Nice Guy](@p3gu8eLHxXC0cuvZ0yXSC05ZROB4X7dpxGCEydIHZ0o=.ed25519) Have you seen [@noffle](@C3iYh/12sO1uvKq1KcZXLFxSySzxOkHxXN8rtNB5MGA=.ed25519)'s guide? I had trouble with a few guides, but [this intro](https://github.com/noffle/git-ssb-intro) is the one that worked for me. My only current issue is that `npm update -g` complains that it can't find the NPM repo for ssb-npm, but otherwise it seemed to work fine.
